title: Google Pixel 3a huge battery drain after updating to android 10
content: Since i've updated my google Pixel 3a to android 10, my battery is draining so fast. The overall performance is much better and faster than prior the the update, but the battery is just so bad. My phone is new, bought it before two weeks and on Android Pie was just fine. I know this a software bug, just letting you know about that.
